metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45682 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: stb_vorbis is a single file MIT licensed library for processing ogg vorbisfiles. A crafted file may trigger out of bounds read in `DECODE` macro when`var` is negative. As it can be seen in the definition of `DECODE_RAW` anegative `var` is a valid value. This issue may be used to leak internalmemory allocation information.

criterions.comment: libstb package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
